titles: An excellent new ballad, shewing the petigree of our royall King Iames the first of that name in England. To the tune of, Gallants all come mourne with mee.
notes: Verse - "England with chearfull hart giue eare,".
Printer's name and publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Appears at reels 740 and 1522 (British Library copy).
keywords: James --  I, --  King of England, 1566-1625 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
